product: Nanit - Plus Smart Baby Monitor & Wall Mount - White
author: Justinother
content: Best Video Quality of ANY of the baby monitors, incredibly useful and their app is amazing. 100% recommend!
title: Best Video Quality

product: Nanit - Plus Smart Baby Monitor & Wall Mount - White
author: RyRy
content: The Nanit system has been a great addition to our nursery and we use it as a compliment to a basic camera system that is not near the crib and off to the side. Having a safe, overhead view helps us sleep a little better at night.
title: Great technology and features

product: Nanit - Plus Smart Baby Monitor & Wall Mount - White

content: Beautiful picture. My wife and I have 2 of these and they do not disappoint. I definitely recommend!
title: Awesome product
